pasugiya wasare di bauddha chithrapata tharagayak ha pradarshanayak da pawathwu bawada ee mahatha kiweya.elambaena 2600 sambuddhathwa jayanthi samaru uthsawayata purwikawak se me wasare di da bauddha chithrapata tharagayak ha pradarshanayak bandaranayaka sammanthrana shala parishraye di pawathwimata katayuthu yoda athayi chamal rajapaksha mahatha me sakachchawe di helidaraw kele ya.kathanayakawarayage sabhapathithwayen yuthu 2600 sambuddhathwa jayanthi uthsawa sanwidhayaka kamituwa wisin labana wasare di jagath kirthiyata path nalu niliyan yoda gena jathyanthara mattame bauddha chithrapatayak nipadawimata da katayuthu aarambha kara athayi mehidi thorathuru anawaranaya wiya.aasiya aalokaya padanama, bandaranayaka anusmarana sammanthrana shalawa, jathika chithrapata sansthawa saha jathyanthara pariganaka ha thorathuru thakshana eejansiya gadhkheeeegha me jathyanthara bauddha chithrapata tharagaya ha pradarshanaya pawathwimata mulikathwaya gena katayuthu karayi.janadhipathi lekam karyalaya, buddhashasana ha sadachara wardhana amathyanshaya, sanskruthika ha jathika urumayan pilibanda amathyanshaya, widesha katayuthu amathyanshaya, janamadhya amathyanshaya athulu amathyansha hathak me uthsawayata purna sahaya labadimata idiripathwi thibe.sambuddha jayanthi bauddha chithrapata tharagaya pasugiya (2009) wasare di da pawathwu athara deshiya ha wideshiya bauddha chithrapata rashiyak ee sandaha idiripath kara thibini.sambuddhathwa jayanthi samaru uthsawa kamituwe sambandhikaraka nithignya saman wiraman mahatha- pasugiya wasare di piliwelin palamu sthanaye sita thunwani sthanaya dakwa bauddha chithrapata thora ganu labu athara me wasare wishishta, itha honda saha honda chithrapata lesa deshiya ha wideshiya washayen chithrapata 6 k thora ganimata thiranaya kara atha.2010) me wasare bauddha chithrapata tharagaya sandaha deshiya ha wideshiya chithrapata 200 kata wada labi thibenawa.elambaena 2600 sambuddhathwa jayanthi uthsawaya wenuwen pawathwena bauddha chithrapata pradarshanaya sinama dansala namin namkara athayi da me masa 28, 29, 30 yana thedina thula ema pradarshanaya bandaranayaka anusmarana sammanthrana shala parishraye di pawathwenawa.uthsawa kamituwe pradhana madhya sambandhikaraka kala kirthi edwin aariyadasa mahatha- wruththantha chithrapata, withthi katha, katun chithrapata, jangama durakathana magin bauddha chithrapata nishpadanaya yi.wesak kadpath, widyuth thorana, aadi wisheshanga rasak me sinama dansale di pradarshanaya kerena bawada edwin aariyadasa mahatha sandahan kale ya.
